div.div: Biological functional groups in the JFRE model and their main configuration.
div.p: The initial biomass in metrics tonnes, the classification ( A) under fisheries means active fishery, ( S) means secondary fishery or bait fishery, ( C) represents currently closed fisheries and ( B) was used for species that are bycatch of other fisheries (J.F. abbreviation stand for Juan Fern√°ndez). More detailed descriptions of the functional groups can be found in the supplementary material.
